doc.after: Even after the development of powered aircraft gliders have been built for research where the lack of powerplant reduces complexity and construction costs and speeds development particularly where new and poorly understood aerodynamic ideas are being tested that might require significant airframe changes Examples have included delta wings flying wings lifting bodies and other unconventional lifting surfaces where existing theories were not sufficiently developed to estimate full scale characteristics
